Author: coconutslut7
Text: And also! if he wants to talk about anything, he can bring it up on his own after seeing the note.

Author: coconutslut7
Text: I would replace all the food where it normally goes in the cabinets, and leave a visible note that just says "sorry for stealing your food. Thanks for putting up with my shenanigans :)". That way you're apologizing, gently thanking him for the support, and replacing the stolen food all in one go. And bonus, without being suspicious about your feelings.
